alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 8:25AM CDT until June 19 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jackson County in southern Mississippi... * Until 915 AM CDT. * At 824 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Helena, or over Moss Point, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Pascagoula Lott Airport measured a peak wind gust of 51 mph at 8:16AM CT. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Moss Point, Escatawpa, Gautier, Hickory Hills and Helena. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 63 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
